mapper.sql: ID, GROUPID, GROUPNAME, PARENTID, GROUPTYPE, COMPANYID,CHIEFIDS,CHIEFNAMES
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hm_pub_group (GROUPID, GROUPNAME, PARENTID, GROUPTYPE, COMPANYID,CHIEFIDS,CHIEFNAMES,SHOPID) VALUES (#{groupId}, #{groupName}, #{parentId}, #{groupType}, #{companyId}, #{chiefIds},#{chiefNames},#{shopId})
mapper.select: SELECT par.ID, par.GROUPID, par.GROUPNAME, par.PARENTID, par.GROUPTYPE, par.COMPANYID,par.CHIEFIDS,par.CHIEFNAMES, grp.ID AS GID,grp.GROUPID AS GRPID, grp.GROUPNAME AS GRPNAME,grp.PARENTID AS PARID,grp.GROUPTYPE AS TYPE, grp.COMPANYID AS CMPID, grp.CHIEFIDS AS CIDS, grp.CHIEFNAMES AS CNAMES,grp.SHOPID FROM hm_pub_group par LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON grp.PARENTID = par.GROUPID AND grp.COMPANYID = par.COMPANYID WHERE par.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND par.PARENTID = '0' ORDER BY par.GROUPTYPE, par.GROUPNAME,grp.GROUPNAME

SELECT par.ID, par.GROUPID, par.GROUPNAME, par.PARENTID, par.GROUPTYPE, par.COMPANYID,par.CHIEFIDS,par.CHIEFNAMES, grp.ID AS GID,grp.GROUPID AS GRPID, grp.GROUPNAME AS GRPNAME,grp.PARENTID AS PARID,grp.GROUPTYPE AS TYPE, grp.COMPANYID AS CMPID, grp.CHIEFIDS AS CIDS, grp.CHIEFNAMES AS CNAMES FROM hm_pub_group par LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON grp.PARENTID = par.GROUPID AND grp.COMPANYID = par.COMPANYID WHERE par.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND par.PARENTID = '0' AND par.GROUPTYPE = #{type} ORDER BY par.ID,grp.ID

SELECT grp.GROUPID FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND (rela.STAFFID = #{staffId} OR INSTR(CONCAT(',',grp.CHIEFIDS,','),CONCAT(',',#{staffId},','))!= 0) GROUP BY grp.GROUPID

SELECT grp.id ID, grp.GROUPID GROUPID, grp.GROUPNAME GROUPNAME, grp.GROUPTYPE GROUPTYPE FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND rela.STAFFID = #{staffId}

SELECT son.GROUPID FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group son on grp.COMPANYID = son.COMPANYID and grp.PARENTID = son.PARENTID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.GROUPTYPE = #{type} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND (rela.STAFFID = #{staffId} OR INSTR(CONCAT(',',grp.CHIEFIDS,','),CONCAT(',',#{staffId},','))!= 0) GROUP BY son.GROUPID

SELECT son.PARENTID FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group son on grp.COMPANYID = son.COMPANYID and grp.PARENTID = son.PARENTID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.GROUPTYPE = #{type} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND (rela.STAFFID =#{staffId} OR INSTR(CONCAT(',',grp.CHIEFIDS,','),CONCAT(',',#{staffId},','))) GROUP BY son.PARENTID

SELECT grp.GROUPID FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff gs ON gs.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID AND gs.GROUPID = grp.GROUPID WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.PARENTID != '0' AND INSTR(grp.GROUPTYPE,'dsyy')!=0 AND gs.STAFFID = #{staffId}
SELECT grp.GROUPID, grp.GROUPNAME, grp.COMPANYID FROM hm_pub_group grp WHERE grp.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND grp.GROUPTYPE = #{type} AND grp.PARENTID != '0'

SELECT par.ID, par.GROUPID, par.GROUPNAME, par.PARENTID, par.GROUPTYPE, par.COMPANYID, par.CHIEFIDS, par.CHIEFNAMES, grp.ID AS GID, grp.GROUPID AS GRPID, grp.GROUPNAME AS GRPNAME, grp.PARENTID AS PARID, grp.GROUPTYPE AS TYPE, grp.COMPANYID AS CMPID, grp.CHIEFIDS AS CIDS, grp.CHIEFNAMES AS CNAMES, grp.SHOPID FROM hm_pub_group par LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON grp.PARENTID = par.GROUPID AND grp.COMPANYID = par.COMPANYID AND grp.GROUPTYPE = par.GROUPTYPE WHERE par.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND par.PARENTID = '0' AND grp.GROUPTYPE = #{role} ORDER BY par.GROUPTYPE, par.GROUPNAME, grp.GROUPNAME
